body_html: @rmlarsen I'm not sure about the c++ shape inference test, although I have tested the shape inference code through python. Is there a quicker way to run the c++ tests on a local machine? I tried bazel test, but it cost 2 hrs every single time.
body_text: @rmlarsen I'm not sure about the c++ shape inference test, although I have tested the shape inference code through python. Is there a quicker way to run the c++ tests on a local machine? I tried bazel test, but it cost 2 hrs every single time.
body: @rmlarsen I'm not sure about the c++ shape inference test, although I have tested the shape inference code through python. Is there a quicker way to run the c++ tests on a local machine? I tried `bazel test`, but it cost 2 hrs every single time.
